synopsis.text: From ordinary to extraordinary, the once unremarkable Su Jiu finds himself on an unconventional path to power when he stumbles upon the divine stone, 'Star Source'. Becoming the new master of the Star Source, Su Jiu embarks on a cultivation journey filled with absurdity and uniqueness. As he hones his newfound abilities, two stunning beauties, You Yihan and Shen Mengxue, seek him out in pursuit of the Star Source. To entice Su Jiu to join their respective sects, they form a temporary alliance to teach him together. However, Su Jiu's rapid progress, fueled by the Star Source, surpasses even their wildest expectations, leading to a series of unpredictable events in this thrilling and comedic adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
